articles.title: 'Whoops' as DeChambeau flies 1,000 miles home, then learns he made cut - The42
articles.description: The 27-year-old American fired a three-under par 68 on Saturday to stand on one-under par 212 after 54 holes.
articles.content:
REIGNING US Open champion Bryson DeChambeau flew 1,000 miles home to Dallas between rounds of the US PGA Wells Fargo Classic only to find he had made the cut.
